interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2014/06/08
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jeremy Podeswa', 'Timothy Van Patten', 'David Nutter', 'Carl Franklin', 'Tony To', 'Graham Yost'], 'Producers': ['Tom Hanks', 'Steven Spielberg', 'Gary Goetzman', 'Cherylanne Martin', 'Todd London', 'Steven Shareshian'], 'Starring': ['James Badge Dale', 'Joe Mazzello', 'Jon Seda'], 'Studio': ['HBO']}
Review Text: Once I started watching I couldn't stop until I'd watched every episode. Each episode is like a mini movie and all the actors are great and the directing and production is first class.
Review Title: Great episodes!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
